statements: SELECT * FROM savings_goal_notification;
SELECT customer_id, goal_amount, notification_date FROM savings_goal_notification;
SELECT * FROM savings_goal_notification WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, current_balance FROM savings_goal_notification WHERE goal_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM savings_goal_notification WHERE is_notified = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, goal_amount FROM savings_goal_notification WHERE goal_amount > 1000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM savings_goal_notification WHERE notification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY notification_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, current_balance FROM savings_goal_notification WHERE current_balance < 5000 ORDER BY current_balance ASC
SELECT * FROM savings_goal_notification WHERE is_notified = true ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, goal_amount, notification_date FROM savings_goal_notification WHERE goal_amount < current_balance ORDER BY notification_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE savings_plan_goal > 1000;
SELECT notification_text, notification_time FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_time DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, savings_plan_goal FROM customers WHERE savings_plan_goal BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE savings_plan_goal > 5000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers INNER JOIN notifications ON customers.customer_id = notifications.customer_id WHERE notification_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY notification_time DESC
SELECT customer_name, email, notification_text FROM customers LEFT JOIN notifications ON customers.customer_id = notifications.customer_id WHERE notifications.notification_time > '2023-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, savings_plan_goal FROM customers WHERE savings_plan_goal BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, savings_goal FROM Customers WHERE savings_goal > 1000;
SELECT * FROM SavingsProgress WHERE current_savings < 5000 ORDER BY current_savings DESC;
SELECT customer_id, notification_message, notification_timestamp FROM Notifications ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE savings_goal > 5000;
SELECT n.notification_id, n.notification_message, c.customer_name FROM Notifications n JOIN Customers c ON n.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, current_savings FROM Customers c JOIN SavingsProgress s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.goal_reached = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, notification_message, notification_timestamp FROM Customers c JOIN Notifications n ON c.customer_id = n.customer_id ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, goal_amount FROM SavingsPlans ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, plan_name, current_amount FROM Customers INNER JOIN SavingsProgress ON Customers.customer_id = SavingsProgress.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, message, timestamp FROM Customers INNER JOIN Notifications ON Customers.customer_id = Notifications.customer_id WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, goal_amount FROM SavingsPlans ORDER BY goal_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, current_amount FROM Customers JOIN SavingsProgress ON Customers.customer_id = SavingsProgress.customer_id WHERE current_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, message, timestamp FROM Notifications WHERE timestamp > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customer;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_name = 'John';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_id FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
